---
title: "Travel and Visas"
---


To check if you require a visa to enter The Gambia, visit the [Visa to The Gambia](https://www.banjulairport.com/en/visa_gambia.php) page, and more for information about entering The Gambia, please visit [this page](https://www.banjulairport.com/en/things_to_know_and_visa_gambia.php#visas).

Attendees are encouraged to take care of their visa applications (if necessary) and event registration in a timely manner. If you need an invitation letter for your visa application, please submit a request [here](https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=DQSIkWdsW0yxEjajBLZtrQAAAAAAAAAAAAO__R90XI1UQ0dZOUhSSUE4Q0NORFQ2SzhHR09STUtRUy4u).


Summit participants requiring a visa letter can obtain one from the HR department at hr@mrc.gm. Please note that only individuals who have registered for the event will be eligible to receive a visa letter from the organizing committee.
